submittedOn.description: The date the other income was added. It must be provided in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ

grossAmount.description: The amount of post-cessation or other business receipts (business receipts taxed as income of an earlier year). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxYear.description: The tax year where business receipts needed taxing as income. Date in the format YYYY-YY.

items.description: Financial details about all other income received whilst abroad income.

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. The value must in a ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 format.

amountBeforeTax.description: The total amount before any tax taken off other income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxTakenOff.description: The amount of tax taken off other income. The value must be between 1 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

specialWithholdingTax.description: Special Withholding Tax (SWT) amount taken off this payment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

foreignTaxCreditRelief.description: A boolean indicating whether Foreign Tax Credit Relief (FTCR) has been claimed. The value must be true or false.

taxableAmount.description: The amount of tax to be paid. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

residentialFinancialCostAmount.description: The amount of residential property income or restricted finance costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

broughtFwdResidentialFinancialCostAmount.description: The unused residential finance costs brought forward. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

overseasIncomeAndGains.description: The container that holds the key value for overseas income and gains.

gainAmount.description: The gains amount on disposals of holdings in offshore funds. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

chargeableForeignBenefitsAndGifts.description: The container that holds the key value for chargeable foreign benefits and gifts.

transactionBenefit.description: Benefit received on an overseas transaction. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

protectedForeignIncomeSourceBenefit.description: Benefit received on a protected foreign income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

protectedForeignIncomeOnwardGift.description: Protected foreign income gifted. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

benefitReceivedAsASettler.description: Benefit received as a settler. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

onwardGiftReceivedAsASettler.description: Gift received as a settler. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

omittedForeignIncome.description: The container that holds the key value for omitted foreign income.

amount.description: The amount of omitted foreign income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative URL of the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The ‘rel’ will be ‘self’ where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.
